channel.title: What do i need to create a sucessful website?
channel.description:
ok i need to create a website and basically i need a list of everything i will need to create a website and connecting it toi the internet.
i use windows frontpage and i fairly experienced in it but up till now ive only ever used it for school or fun, but now i am serious about making a website to go online.
whats smf?
if anyone has any hot links to where i can download essentials please post.
thanks all talk soon
EDIT: i am using fp but if anyone knows any other good website makers please tell me... hmmm what did mopar use?? :p

item.title: What do i need to create a sucessful website?
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

Basically. Create pages on your comp. That are on a topic that interests you. If your looking for just money through ads and crap it wont work. If you aim to make a website just so you can get tonnes of traffic and make money. More then liekyl you will have to choose a topic outside of your interests. Thus making it crap. once youve basically finished pages. Just go find a host. Usually they will sell you a domain aswell. If not then you will have to find someone who will sell you your domain. But once your host has it all set up for you. Then all you need to do is usually wait till DNS catches up with you (sometimes). Then either use the ftp client to add pages or if you have like specifc stuff like forums and stuff. Quite often hosts have a panel thing where you can add that sort of stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i need to create a sucessful website?

item.title: What do i need to create a sucessful website?
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

100webspace.com

Budget web hosting services and domain names from 100WebSpace

100WebSpace provides a variety of web hosting services and domain names at an affordable price. A free Web Apps Installer of blogs, CMSs, image galleries, etc. 24/7 tech support with 1 hour response time.


probably the best free hosting youll find php mySQL 100mb of space FTP file manager freindly user easy. If not that for easy stuff i suggest www.bravenet.com use the noscript tag to kill banners (in tutorials section) and have a look at other sites make sure you have a contact me and news page. and its easy to read and and not hard to edit. And i recommend using dreamweaver you can download the trial on www.adobe.com and use the 94FBR trick to get a serial key type in google “dreamweaver 8” 94FBR and a serial will appear.

Read full topic
